name: Ellie Greenwich
description: '''Eleanor Louise Greenwich''' (October 23, 1940 – August 26, 2009) was an American [[Popular music|pop music]] singer, songwriter, and record producer. She wrote or co-wrote "[[Da Doo Ron Ron]]", "[[Be My Baby]]", "[[Maybe I Know]]", "[[Then He Kissed Me]]", "[[Do Wah Diddy Diddy]]", "[[Christmas (Baby Please Come Home)]]", "[[Hanky Panky (Tommy James and the Shondells song)|Hanky Panky]]", "[[Chapel of Love]]", "[[Leader of the Pack]]", and "[[River Deep – Mountain High]]", among others.
